title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - September 17, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - September 17, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary link up to discuss a new story involving a missing young girl and give a long overdue update on the crazy Murdaugh case out of South Carolina where arrests are finally happening. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
